title: A pattern of love; or, The faithful lovers well met. Here's love for love you may behold, and true love better is than gold: for if my song you well do mind, patterns of true love here you'l find. To the tune of, The cannons rore. This may be printed, R.P.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J. Blare at the Looking-Glass on London-bridge.,
